name: calligraphy painting
description:
An artist can show his identity in the works he creates, it doesn't matter what you think, bitter or sweet. It is important to have a new look and pass over old ideas. I use painting  to show my creativity.
In the works l create, I apply my ideas with creativity and various techniques on different materials with a forms that borrow from the values of Iranian lines far from limitation of the world of calligraphy and nature.
The collection of warm - cold and complementary colors in my works, which are express the nature, has always tasted endless pleasure for me, which I have experienced over and over again.
Also, the embrace of colors with forms of Iranian calligraphy and nature with a combination of acrylic and combined water techniques on different materials with ups and downs, dark and light and the intertwined forms of the subconscious attract the audience to challenge their mind.
